message: I have my phone rooted with a terminal on it. I know I have to edit the nv_data.bin file with a hex editor but I have yet to find an explanation of how to do this without paying money for an app
This post mentions the pro app, but also has the instructions. NOTE: I have not tried this: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=761045
I've used z4root on my DroidX, and they say it works on your phone too.  http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=833953
unlock as in root?  otherwise once there was an app that unlocked the phone for use with other carriers. sorry dont remember the name. SGS Unlock or smth...
